attributes.action: Remove current Government for lying during the last election. Take power back
attributes.additional_details: Control of the UK Government needs to be returned back to the people.  They are here to conduct the will of the people.   The people voted to leave.  We have not.  The people voted for a Government which vowed to leave on the 29th March 2019 with or without a deal.  We did not.  The manifesto provides a written contract between the voted party and the people.  This has been broken.
attributes.background: The people voted to leave the EU.  We had a general election which the current PM vowed we would leave on the 29th March 2019 with or without a deal.  This a major reason people voted.  This has proven to be a lie and fraudulent.  As a result power needs to be returned back to the people.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like a general election, you may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
